categories.label: Online Shopping
categories.description: E-commerce websites and apps like Amazon, Flipkart, Myntra

categories.label: Food & Dining
categories.description: Restaurants, cafes, food delivery apps like Swiggy and Zomato

categories.label: Travel
categories.description: Flights, hotels, trains, buses, travel booking platforms

categories.label: Fuel
categories.description: Petrol, diesel, CNG at fuel stations

categories.label: Utilities
categories.description: Electricity, gas, water, mobile, broadband, DTH bills

categories.label: Entertainment
categories.description: Movies, events, OTT platforms, ticket bookings

categories.label: International Spend
categories.description: Any transaction done in foreign currency

categories.label: Wallet Load
categories.description: Wallet top-ups, P2P loads, prepaid balances

categories.label: Others
categories.description: Any transaction not fitting above categories
